title: Business Pain Signals
description: Aggregated signals of operational pain across companies. This feed highlights areas where organisations experience scaling bottlenecks, technical debt, regulatory pressure or other blockers that present opportunities for service providers.

fields.entity: Object describing the subject of the pain (e.g. company, project or department)
fields.pain_category: High-level category of the pain (scaling, cost, compliance, reliability, etc.)
fields.severity: Numeric score between 0 and 10 indicating relative severity
fields.confidence: Probability (0-1) that this signal truly reflects the described pain
fields.signals: List of short phrases summarising evidence of pain
fields.first_seen: Date when the pain signal first surfaced
fields.last_confirmed: Date when the pain signal was last observed
fields.references: List of source URLs or citations for the pain signals
fields.actionability.urgency_days: Recommended number of days before this issue should be addressed
fields.actionability.budget_estimate_usd: Two-element array with low and high budget estimates in USD
